name: I Wanna Run The Triathlon
description:
Yet another one of deez hard 2D platformers... This one is a bit different though! Unlike my previous games, you can unlock skins! Anyways, if you want me to add a level select feature, please write a comment about it! Feedback that can improve the game is highly appreciated.

Besides that I do feel obligated to mention that this game is highly inspired by I Wanna Run The Marathon as well as I Wanna Be The Boshy.

Music used in the game can be found here (potential spoilers btw!): https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtbwJupXuG-AeedkQZtVbdAKzyzNafrR3
